tool_description: ShortPixel is an image compression API that helps reduce the size of most common image files: JPEG, PNG and GIF (also animated)
name: ShortPixel Image Optimiser
title: ShortPixel Image Optimiser

api_list.name: Reducer
api_list.description: This is the main API, and allows you to shrink an image based on the URL of the image. The images has to be available online in order to be shrunk via this API.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL where the original image is located. This needs to be a valid URL and urlencoded

optional_parameters.name: lossy
optional_parameters.description: Controls whether the image compression will use a lossy or lossless algorithm

optional_parameters.name: wait
optional_parameters.description: Set it to 1 to wait for the conversion to be done before the API returns, 0 to return immediately. If set to 1, the API call will wait up to 10 seconds for the image to be converted
